author: Peter Helman
title: The New Pornographers – “High Ticket Attractions”
text:
January 26, 2017 - 11:09 pm   
Canadian power-pop all-stars the New Pornographers are back with their first new song since 2014’s Brill Bruisers . Like all the best New Pornos songs, “High Ticket Attractions” is a winningly melodic pop gem, a slice of driving electric guitars and burbling synths that serves as the lead single for the newly announced album Whiteout Conditions . The rest of the LP will be out in April, but you can hear “High Ticket Attractions” now below. Do that. 
Here’s the album’s tracklist: 
01 “Play Money”
